Class: Text

DrawerJs.plugins. Text

new Text(drawerInstance, options)

Provides an editable text shape.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawerInstance
options Object Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Description
editIconSize number Sets the 'edit icon' size, in pixels. Default is 32px. More then 64px is not recommended.
editIconMode boolean Sets if 'edit icon' mode is on.
predefined object.<string, array> List of available values from control dropdown
defaultValues object.<string, array> List of default values of styles
Source:
  • plugins/shape-text/Text.js, line 30

Min size of shape in px. If less - shape will not be added

toolOptionsList :Array.<String>

List of tool options to show when tool is activated. Deviating from BaseShape tool, Line has no 'color', only 'border'.
Type:
  • Array.<String>

Type
Boolean

removeTool(doDeleteToolbarCreationListeners)

Removes tool controls. If doDeleteToolbarCreationListeners is true - removes listeners on toolbar creation event. So, tool will not appear on toolbar next time, when toolbar is created.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
doDeleteToolbarCreationListeners boolean
